revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Hall of Origin |image = [[File:Hall of Origin.png|200px]] |caption = A map of the Hall of Origin. |tokens = 106,500 |location = Mt. Coronet }} The '''Hall of Origin''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 2,653,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Slowpoke.png|40px]] Slowpoke || colspan=2 rowspan=7| <center> N/A |- | [[File:Spearow.png|40px]] Spearow |- | [[File:Garchomp.png|40px]] Garchomp |- | [[File:Slakoth.png|40px]] Slakoth |- | [[File:Eevee.png|40px]] Eevee |- | [[File:Breloom.png|40px]] Breloom |- | [[File:Absol.png|40px]] Absol |}

Base Health |- | [[File:Slaking.png|40px]] Slaking || rowspan=4| <center> 10,000,000|| rowspan=5 colspan=3| <center> N/A |- | [[File:Snorlax.png|40px]] Snorlax |- | [[File:Shuckle.png|40px]] Shuckle |- | [[File:Blissey.png|40px]] Blissey |- | [[File:Arceus.png|40px]] Arceus (Normal) || <center>13,000,000 |}
